articles.author: Bojan Pancevski, Laurence Norman and Georgi Kantchev
articles.title: Germany Drops Opposition to Embargo on Russian Oil - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Germany—which had been one of the main opponents of sanctioning the European Union’s oil and gas trade with Moscow—is now ready to stop buying Russian oil, clearing the way for an EU ban on crude imports from Russia, government officials said.

articles.title: Poland says countries paying for Russian gas in roubles should be penalised - Reuters.com
articles.description: The European Union should penalise countries that use roubles to pay for Russian gas, Poland's climate minister said, following Moscow's decision to cut off supplies to Poland and Bulgaria over their refusal to do so.
